posts.caption:
Come spend a weekend in Boulder learning about arm balances and inversions with me and @samseesworld at @bodhimovement!
This two day intensive will cover both foundations as well as more advanced techniques.
December 1st and 2nd, 9am-3:30pm both days.
Link in my bio for more info!
📸 @brookemichellej in @aloyoga

Two chances to practice with us tomorrow (Wednesday) @bodhimovement
6:30am Rocket Yoga with @mtn_shanimal
6:30pm Power Hour with @enchantedpsyche
Both classes are 60 minute vinyasa flows. $10 suggested donation! ❤️ hope to see you at one or both!
www.bodhiboulder.com

Want to work on your handstands? I am now teaching a handstand conditioning class on Thursdays at 6:30pm @bodhimovement. Donation based, all levels welcome (even if you don’t know how to handstand!) Class will include wrist, shoulder, and core warm ups before moving into flexibility work and handstand drills (on and off the wall) catered to the students in the room!
Shout out to @onthecountofthree @chelseykorus and @mike.aidala in the background!

Just a casual stroll through the woods with @hollybentley_yoga 🤔 it kind of blows my mind that I used to do push my body close to the limit for photos regularly (like, daily). Now I’m either lazier or smarter, because I’d rather lay on the couch (or on my yoga mat in pigeon pose) 90% of the time. Although we know I do love to handstand 😂🤷‍♀️ 📸 @spencerbentley_creates
Inspired by @meliniseri and @nwoy
Wearing @aloyoga’s new soft collection- sign up for their newsletter for early access!!

💛🌿🌞 two days left here at @casaom and I’m already planning on coming back. I’m only teaching two retreats next year: a volunteer retreat to Puerto Rico in January (@bodhimovement) and another 50hr intensive here in Mexico at @casaom next October.
Hope to see you at one of them!! 📸 @brookemichellej in @aloyoga
Answering emails wondering how many more I will have by the time I am done 😂😭 anyone else feel like this?
😭😂 #selfcare ?

Last chance to join my 50hr intensive in Mexico October 21-27. Only one spot left! Message me for more info.
What’s included: •Transportation to and from the Cancun International Airport (30 min drive) •Twice daily yoga practices ranging from vinyasa to yin •Daily meditation and lectures/discussions on yoga theory and philosophy, business, photography, and more •Special workshops on backbends, inversions, and more •Professional photos •Brunch daily •4 dinners •Laundry, yoga mats, and towels •Free time to enjoy on the beach or to head out on an excursion of your choice (additional fees apply) •Upon completion you will receive a certificate that counts for 50 hours of continued education through Yoga Alliance (there will be some small homework/journaling assignments)
📷 @brookemichellej

Thursday @bodhimovement
6pm Handstand Conditioning (beginner friendly)

We all need the time and space to take care of ourselves. That’s one of the reasons that @samseesworld and I have made our classes at @bodhimovement donation based, and the studio itself a non-profit. With a $10 suggested drop-in and a $5 minimum, we try to make yoga accessible to everyone. But we still need your support in spreading the word and also coming to practice if you live in the area. If you know someone that lives in or near Boulder and might be interested in coming to our little studio, would you let them know about us? And if you are in a place financially where you would like to help us but don’t live nearby, we can accept tax-deductible donations through paypal.me/bodhiboulder
50% of donations go to upkeep of the studio
20% go to scholarships for our teacher trainings
And 30% is split between two outreach projects in Bangalore, India (read more on our website). Thank you so much for reading this far, and for any support you can offer. ❤️
One trick pony 😂😭🐎@bodhimovement 💙

✨ GIVEAWAY TIME! Update: the winner is @tori_weinkauf !

I try to spend a little time every day on muscle recovery and self care. Sometimes it’s just taking a bath or using a foam roller, but lately the @theragun has been my favorite way to relieve tension and soreness in my muscles- especially my forearms and upper back. I’ve also been using it on my hips and I can’t even describe how good it feels!

#theragun #makingwaves

Donation based, all levels flow. 75 min. 💙

@samseesworld will be subbing my handstand conditioning class tonight at 6:30pm @bodhimovement
I wish I could be there to take it! 60 mins of drills and skills to help you build strength and body awareness. $10 suggested donation. Thanks for teaching for me while I’m gone, @samseesworld!

Our number one goal in our yoga teacher trainings is to prepare our students to teach safe yoga asana classes as well as deepen their understanding of their own practices. Our second goal is to expand our minds (teachers included) to understand the context of yoga both historically and in our modern society. This includes covering topics like colonization, inclusivity, cultural appropriation and more. Our guest teachers like @nolatrees and @rachel.cargle help us dive deeper into these topics.
If this sounds like the kind of yoga teacher training you’d like to be part of, apply today.
Upcoming trainings in BOULDER, CO next summer.
Link in my bio for more info ❤️ June 9th - 30th • 200hr training
July 14 - August 11 • 300hr training

@bodhimovement

I am scared to have a daughter.
I am scared I wouldn’t be able to protect her.
I am scared that one night she might drink a little too much
And trust the wrong person
Or feel safe when she shouldn’t.
And if something does happen to her
I am scared that society will try to silence her if she tries to speak up
That they will tell her it was her own fault
And that maybe if she covered up
Or didn’t have that last drink
It wouldn’t have happened to her.
Because that’s what happened to me.
I believe Dr. Ford.
Come practice with me tomorrow at 10am @bodhimovement we will roll around on the floor and maybe do some fun stuff too 😂 link in my bio to sign up! 📷 @brookemichellej
